gameDetails.name: Space Dealer: All-Zeit
gameDetails.description:
All-Zeit is an expansion for Space Dealer, which brings you 44 new cards.  Ten white wooden cubes are provided for the new "Energy Shield" and "Chronosphere" technologies.  Both German and English rules are included.
The new cards include new Gizzi "contracts," updates for the fusion mine and the sabotage probe, cooperative challenges, wormholes, the chronosphere, and the fearsome intergalactic mop and bucket brigade.
(Although the box states 2-4 Players, it has no rules for 2 Players included.)

Expands:

    Space Dealer
